tool.name: HOP Filter
tool.command: python $__tool_directory__/hop_vcf_filt.py --infile "${input}" --infile_genes "${input_genes}" --outfile output.vcf --outfile_bad "${output_bad}" #if $chrom: #if $coord: --chrom "${chrom}" --coord "${coord}" #end if #end if && python $__tool_directory__/vcf_reformat.py output.vcf "${output_tsv}"

param.name: chrom
param.label: Optional Chromosome (both chrom and coord must be specified)

param.name: coord
param.label: Optional Coordinate (both chrom and coord must be specified)
